statements: UPDATE neural_network_changes SET architecture = 'LSTM' WHERE change_id = 1;
UPDATE neural_network_changes SET hyperparameters = '{"learning_rate": 0.001, "epochs": 50}' WHERE network_name = 'CNN';
UPDATE neural_network_changes SET architecture = 'CNN', hyperparameters = '{"learning_rate": 0.001}' WHERE network_name = 'ImageRecognition' AND change_id = 3
UPDATE neural_network_changes SET change_timestamp = '2021-10-20 08:30:00', architecture = 'RNN' WHERE network_name = 'NLP'
UPDATE neural_network_architectures SET architecture_name = 'CNN', hyperparameters = '{"layers": 5}', last_updated = NOW() WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE architecture_changes SET change_description = 'Updated hyperparameters', change_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE change_id = 1;
UPDATE neural_network_architectures SET architecture_name = 'CNN', hyperparameters = '{"layers": ["conv", "pool", "dense"]}', last_updated = NOW() WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE architecture_changes SET change_description = 'Added new convolution layer', change_date = '2021-12-01' WHERE architecture_id = 1;
UPDATE neural_network_architectures SET architecture_name = 'CNN', hyperparameters = '{"layers": 5, "activation": "relu"}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE architecture_changes SET change_description = 'Updated architecture hyperparameters', change_date = '2022-03-15 17:30:00' WHERE change_id = 3;
UPDATE neural_network_architectures SET hyperparameters = '{"learning_rate": 0.001, "epochs": 100}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE architecture_changes SET change_description = 'Improved performance by optimizing hyperparameters' WHERE change_id = 3;
UPDATE neural_network_architectures SET architecture_name = 'ResNet-50', architecture_details = 'Convolutional neural network with 50 layers' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE hyperparameters SET parameter_value = '0.001' WHERE parameter_name = 'learning_rate';
UPDATE neural_network_architectures SET architecture_name = 'ModelA', created_at = '2023-09-15 12:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE hyperparameters SET parameter_name = 'learning_rate', parameter_value = '0.001' WHERE architecture_id = 1;
UPDATE neural_network_architectures SET modifications = 'Added regularization' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE architecture_versions SET version_description = 'Improved performance' WHERE architecture_id = 3;
UPDATE neural_network_architectures SET modifications = 'Added new layer', hyperparameters = '{"layers": ["conv1", "conv2", "dense1"]}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE architecture_changes SET change_description = 'Updated hyperparameters', change_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE architecture_id = 2;
